TopicTitle: How to put space stations in space?

Articles.Content: Hi all,i was just wondering how do you guys put space stations in space?do i need a mod to do it,also is it possible to create stations on other planets,if so how.thanks all

You can build it in the assembly thing and just cheat it into space ;P or you can use rockets and launch the modules up into space a few at a time. You can then dock them together to assemble your station. Stations tend to be laggy though

This helps with some of the larger ones:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9618-PLUGIN-PARTS-0-16-Gravity-Canceller-v1-1
You could launch the whole thing into orbit or just assemble them in orbit by docking.
